title: Demons and Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/26/17
itunes:title: Demons and Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/26/17
description:
George Noory and demonology expert Adam Blai discuss the increase in cases of exorcisms performed by Catholic priests, and ways to protect yourself from demonic possession.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
